name: Quaterneo
description:
Quaterneo is an atmospheric action puzzle game. It features familiar block stacking mechanics with a unique "twist". Rotate pieces to clear them and reveal adjacent null blocks. Chain together clears for massive point gains.

Features

  • Easy to learn, deeply strategic.
  • Trance inducing audiovisual experience.
  • 3 different play modes.
  • Online scoreboards.
  • Unlockable cosmetics.

Created in 15 days for the GameMaker #AmazeMeGJ.
